decision_conditions: The Council of the London Borough of Sutton, being the Local Planning Authority, hereby certify that on 30th June 2025 the operations described in the First Schedule in respect of the land specified in the Second Schedule to this certificate and edged on the plan attached to this certificate, was lawful within the meaning of Section 191 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for the following reason(s):The existing use of the building is lawful under section 191 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended), as it has operated for a period of more than ten years.
